Articles.Content:
Whenever i try to switch craft, game freezes. Here is my mod list.

000_Toolbar
ActiveTextureManagement(basic)
BoulderCo
EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements (low res)
Firespitter (DLL Only)
JSI
KAS
Kerbaltek
Klockheed_Martian (included with-
KSO (phase 1-2-3)
Mechjeb2
Mechjeb2RPM
NASAmission
NothkeSerCom (6s service tubes)
SCANsatRPM (dont use)
SmokeScreen
Squad
ThunderAerospace (selfdestruct)
Module Manager 2.1.5

I will go no mods until fixed. Only EVE, ATM, BC. (boulder co)

Edited July 9, 2014 by kenbobo

hm, could be a problem with the RAM usage of KSP. Since there is no official 64-bit version it freezes around 3.6/3.7 GB.

If it's the RAM usage and you want all the listed mods, you will have to wait till 0.24 for a fix. (Or set a higher compression rate in ATM )
Definitely not RAM. You barely have any mods. I have 50 of them and my game runs fine on half textures.
